paper_abstract: The notion of the repetition threshold, which is the object of Dejean's conjecture (1972), was generalized by Hie et al. (2005)181 to include the lengths of the avoided words. We give a lower and an upper bound on this generalized repetition threshold. (C) 2010 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Bounds for the generalized repetition threshold
